sentences.english: It is suiciding ignorance of the highest order.
sentences.chinese: 這是最無知的自掘墳墓。

sentences.english: I never dug the graves in Talafar.
sentences.chinese: 我不想在塔拉自掘墳墓。

sentences.english: Witnesses said that the prisoners were forced to dig their own trench graves before the slaughter.
sentences.chinese: 目擊者說，囚犯們在死前要自掘墳墓。

sentences.english: You are just digging your own grave if you go on smoking so heavily.
sentences.chinese: 你繼續這樣過度吸菸，就是在自掘墳墓。

sentences.english: Gluttons dig their graves with their teeth.
sentences.chinese: 饞嘴貪食的人，用自己的牙齒自掘墳墓。
